## SuggestCommandParams interface

A parameter builder interface which adds the command property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SuggestCommandParams<GCommand extends AnyFunction<void> = AnyFunction<void>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [command](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestcommandparams.command.md) | <code>GCommand</code> | A command which automatically applies the provided attributes to the command. |
